translations: 使……敬畏；使……惊叹（awe 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.translation: 我们敬畏地默然观看着。

sentences.sentence: The majesty of the skyscraper awed me.
sentences.translation: 这幢摩天大厦的雄伟气势令我惊叹。

sentences.sentence: Even the pirates were awed, and Tootles cried out hysterically, "I am going to do what my mother hopes."
sentences.translation: 连海盗们心生敬畏，图托斯歇斯底里地叫道：“我要去做我母亲希望我做的事。”
